infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: nano-SYNAPSYS uses Face ID to protect your secure messages.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: nano-SYNAPSYS reads your contacts so you can invite them to join.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: nano-SYNAPSYS uses the camera to capture images for chat.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: nano-SYNAPSYS accesses your photos to send images in chat.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: nano-SYNAPSYS uses your location to attach GPS coordinates to your profile.

plugins.faceIDPermission: nano-SYNAPSYS uses Face ID to protect your secure messages.

plugins.cameraPermission: nano-SYNAPSYS uses the camera to capture images for chat.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: nano-SYNAPSYS uses your location to attach GPS coordinates to your profile.
